titles.title: Come Let Us Worship And Bow Down

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come let us worship and bow down, Let us kneel before the Lord our God, our Maker. Come let us worship and bow down, Let us kneel before the Lord our God, our Maker.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For He is our God, And we are the people of His pasture, And the sheep of His hand, And the sheep of His hand.{/lang-eng}
